metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000120 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow exists in curl 7.12.3 to and including curl 7.58.0 in theFTP URL handling that allows an attacker to cause a denial of service orworse.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000120` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.15
libcurl3 - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.15
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.15
libcurl3-nss - 7.35.0-1ubuntu2.15
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.35.0-1ubuntu2.15').
